entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
